questiontext.text:
Key point Nøkkelpunkt


The unique solution to the equations: Den unike løsningen på likningene:

\(\qquad ax+by=e\) \(\qquad ax+by=e\)

\(\qquad cx+dy=f\) \(\qquad cx+dy=f\)

is given by: er gitt ved:

\(\qquad x=\dfrac{\Delta_x}{\Delta},\ \ y=\dfrac{\Delta_y}{\Delta}\) \(\qquad x=\dfrac{\Delta_x}{\Delta},\ \ y=\dfrac{\Delta_y}{\Delta}\)

in which hvor

\(\qquad\Delta=\left|\begin{array}{cc}a&b\\ c&d\end{array}\right|,\ \ \Delta_x=\left|\begin{array}{cc}e&b\\ f&d\end{array}\right|,\ \ \Delta_y=\left|\begin{array}{cc}a&e\\ c&f\end{array}\right|.\) \(\qquad\Delta=\left|\begin{array}{cc}a&b\\ c&d\end{array}\right|\), \(\Delta_x=\left|\begin{array}{cc}e&b\\ f&d\end{array}\right|\), \( \Delta_y=\left|\begin{array}{cc}a&e\\ c&f\end{array}\right|\).

If \(\Delta=0\) this method of solution cannot be used. Hvis \(\Delta=0\) kan ikke denne løsningsmetoden brukes.
